name: HepatitisCProceduresCodes
title: Hepatitis C Procedures Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Hepatitis C Procedures element

concept.display: RNA testing for Hepatitis C documented as performed within 6 months prior to initiation of antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP-C)
Hepatitis C quantitative RNA testing documented as performed at 12 weeks from initiation of antiviral treatment (HEP-C)
Ribonucleic acid (RNA) testing for Hepatitis C viremia ordered or results documented (HEP C)
Hepatitis C genotype testing documented as performed prior to initiation of antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP C)
Hepatitis C screening documented as performed (HIV)
Patient receiving antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP-C)
Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

Infectious disease, chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, six biochemical assays (ALT, A2-macroglobulin, apolipoprotein A-1, total bilirubin, GGT, and haptoglobin) utilizing serum, prognostic algorithm reported as scores for fibrosis and necroinflammatory activity in liver
